content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find this apartment to be a great fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm open to discussing a fair price, Mister Schmidt. Could you please tell me what you believe is a reasonable monthly rent for this apartment?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Maryam. I believe a fair and reasonable monthly rent for this apartment, considering its prime location and modern amenities, would be €1,200. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your straightforwardness. While €1,200 is a fair price, I was hoping for something a bit more in line with my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower offer?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Maryam. I'm always open to negotiation. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was hoping for something around €900 per month, Mister Schmidt. I believe this would be a mutually beneficial agreement, considering the current market rates and the apartment's condition.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but €900 is much lower than my asking price. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay the market value for such a prime location. If you're unable to meet my asking price, I'm afraid we may have to reconsider. What's the highest amount you're willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I'm on a tight budget, and €1,200 is quite high for me. I'm willing to go up to €1,000 per month, taking into account the apartment's location and condition. I believe this is a fair compromise.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, €1,000 is closer to what I had in mind. However, I'm still a bit hesitant. Let's discuss the terms further. What other benefits or guarantees could you offer me as a landlord to sweeten the deal?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a responsible and dependable tenant, I can offer you a long-term lease, if that's something you're interested in. Additionally, I can provide a security deposit and a reference from my previous landlord, which I'm sure will attest to my reliability as a tenant.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Those are all good points, Maryam. A long-term lease would certainly be beneficial to both of us. And a security deposit, along with a good reference, would give me peace of mind. Let's say we agree on €1,050 per month. Would that be acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm grateful for your willingness to negotiate. €1,050 per month is a fair price, and with the additional terms we've discussed, I believe this will be a good arrangement for both of us. I agree to the price of €1,050 Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Maryam. You'll receive a lease agreement in the mail shortly. Once you've reviewed it and we've both signed the contract, we'll officially be able to proceed with the rental. Thank you for your time and for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be a great tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to signing the lease and making this apartment my new home. I'm sure it will be a wonderful living space for me. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
